**Introduction**

Hello, I'm Cameron Bodine.  I'm a second year PhD student in the Ecological Informatics Program. I worked for Florida Fish and Wildlife for 5 years mapping river bottom habitats.  I'm at NAU to develop an automated approach to mapping in-stream habitat.
